extendedInfo.description: The Dragonplay widget is the best way to stay up to date with the latest news, bonuses and promotions in all of Dragonplay's games.You can now select from two widget types, each with its great features:- Receive an extra Live Holdem Pro daily bonus when you select the Live Holdem widget.- Gain instant access to all the Dragonplay games in one click when you select the Dragonplay Games widget.Be the first in the know! Install your Dragonplay widget of choice now.

reviews.title: Great, when it works...
reviews.comment: Yet again the widget is not working correctly. Only works as a shortcut. Needs an update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gone
reviews.comment: Used to have the slot city widget that gave ya a bonus every four hours can\'t even find it on playstore to get it back. Majorly disappointed. This could possibly lose me as a devoted player. PLEASE HELP ME TO GET IT BACK THANKYOU
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Not working again. Think I might need to remove this. No daily bonuses. It says I can get them, but doesn\'t give them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not happy!
reviews.comment: My dragonplay widget freezes & gets stuck a lot so I can\'t play game by clicking it & now I\'m also not receiving my daily widget bonus when it is letting me click it, 3days in a row now! Please fix, thank you. When fixed get 5 stars back
reviews.author: JENNIFER AMADOR

reviews.title: VIP badges can\'t be received
reviews.comment: I have at least five reguests concerning my VIP badge. I have loaded and unladed your widgets several times. Please give the real link to achieve what you told I had received.  THANK YOU VERY MUCH.    paula040788@gmail.com
reviews.author: Paula Haywood

reviews.title: Pale rider
reviews.comment: Well folks they managed to Fk  up what used to b the best poker game on the market! Now the widget doesn\'t work at all and the the game won\'t open. Instead u get an application error message and no way to play the game. If ur lucky enough to get into the game,  on the first deal the game freezes and steals ur chips... way to go dragonplay! Funny how they have no trouble changing the table decor every week but they can\'t seem to fix the problems!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app UNTIL NOW
reviews.comment: Dragonplay I can\'t believe u did me like this. I love the setup and game play, but the game started freezing up and u took $59,000,000 from plz set this str8 so I can rate a 5* like b4!!! Pissd Player
reviews.author: Marko Mahorn

reviews.title: Dissatisfied
reviews.comment: Installed with hopes to get the extra daily bonus as it states in the commentary but no luck as the widget isn\'t responding or even for that fact showing up in my \"apps\" am disappointed as a result I am uninstalling. Time waster.
reviews.author: Mana Wilson

reviews.title: When will this be sorted out
reviews.comment: Widget used to work fine now only acts as a shortcut, received no daily bonus for 2 weeks now clock stuck on 23 hr\'s sort it out
reviews.author: David Dobbin

reviews.title: Stopped working
reviews.comment: My widget had stopped working... I click four bonus and it says initializing for days! Have removed and replaced it with no luck.  :-(
reviews.author: Melody Callentine

reviews.title: Worked w the old, not w new
reviews.comment: When Dragonplay discontinued the Live Hold\'em Poke Pro this week, wrapping it into the DragonPlay Poker app, they did not update this widget. So clicking on the Hold\'em button in the widget brings up a message explaining that I need to install  DragonPlay Poker, which is already installed. So, no daily widget use bonus. Strange, since the widget shows to have been updated on March 20, 2013, very near the time of the change I am describing...Also, the Dragonplay Poker app does not have (or has hidden) the opportunities that formerly existed to get free chips through a lottery, recommending to friends, etc. No biggie there.
reviews.author: Pete Slover

reviews.title: Great! Needs update...
reviews.comment: Its the only widget I use! Love the extra 3k a day on Dragonplay\'s Texas hold\'em. :D However, it could use a good update. The Texas Hold\'em icon is old and new skins would be nice too. @Pebbles
reviews.author: Pebbles Flintstone

reviews.title: fun game to play while you pass time by
reviews.comment: recommend to everyone
reviews.author: Annette Terry

reviews.title: It keeps flops interesting, tournments are worth going to...
reviews.comment: This mofo right here, is the shizznit...!
reviews.author: Jonathan Wade

reviews.title: We will c
reviews.comment: Love the app if  I had longer I would ad 5. But not long so 3
reviews.author: Sheryl Russell

reviews.title: Awesome Widget!!
reviews.comment: Best ever.,
reviews.author: Todd Zelinsky

reviews.title: Lg optimus g
reviews.comment: Excellent widget for phone. Easy to access into game. Been playing for a good couple yrs and only splurged once on a coin package. Friend me, feferider45 i gift often. Free spins or coins so cool.
reviews.author: Deanna Wangerin

reviews.title: taking my cash
reviews.comment: The fast fold game has now taken 2 mil. In chips from me! The game used to glitch, but was able to recover my chips. Now it continually knocks me out of game, and takes my chips!! (Only happens when I am winning) I call \"shenanigans\"!!....   JUST DID IT AGAIN!!!! 2 MORE TIMES!! WTF????
reviews.author: Eddie Scarpelli

reviews.title: Quality has gone way way down
reviews.comment: This used to be my favorite game/app, hands down. The gaming quality has gone down terribly. No longer have the ability to explore tables, I haven\'t received the 3000 coin widget bonus in at least a month (always enter game thru widget). Get back to the level you were at before for a better rating. - previously ranked 5 stars...
reviews.author: Gema Menendez

reviews.title: @Jessica
reviews.comment: Excited game really enjoy playing.
reviews.author: jessica Lynn
